Detailed Description

functionalities to support Jupyter in driving the robot

This node implements a support for a user interface built in Jupyter.
Here are the functionalities of the node:

- The node can switch between authomatic mode and manual mode through a service called '/ui_trigger'
- When the authomatic mode is enabled, the random target service is immediately activated
- When the manual mode is required through the service, the authomatic behaviour is turned off

implementation of the trigger service

Args:
    trig (std_srv.srv.SetBoolRequest) if set or not the manual mode

Returns:
    std_srv.SetBoolResponse: useless

Definition at line 35 of file jupyter_user_interface.py.

35 def cbk_ui_trigger( trig ):
36  """implementation of the trigger service
37 
38  Args:
39  trig (std_srv.srv.SetBoolRequest) if set or not the manual mode
40 
41  Returns:
42  std_srv.SetBoolResponse: useless
43  """
44  global use_manual_mode
45 
46  rospy.loginfo( "received request from Jupyter : { data:%s }", str( trig.data ) )
47  if use_manual_mode and (not trig.data):
48  # turn on the authomatic behaviour
49  rospy.loginfo( "starting authomatic behaviour ..." )
50  cli_ui_client( CommandRequest( command="start" ) )
51  rospy.loginfo( "starting authomatic behaviour ... OK!" )
52  use_manual_mode = False
53 
54  elif (not use_manual_mode) and trig.data:
55  # turn off the authomatic behaviour
56  rospy.loginfo( "stopping authomatic behaviour ..." )
57  cli_ui_client( CommandRequest( command="stop" ) )
58  rospy.loginfo( "stopping authomatic behaviour ... OK!" )
59  use_manual_mode = True
60 
61  return SetBoolResponse( )
